title: Vertical Video on the Small Screen Is No Crime
author: Farhad Manjoo
summary: There are strong opinions about whether to shoot video vertically or horizontally. Holding your phone the “wrong way” provokes both professionals and amateurs, Farhad Manjoo writes.

title: "A SOFT MURMUR" – This site will help you to set up ambient sounds to wash away distractions.
Matchmakers Are Happier Than Non-Matchmakers, Research Shows
author: Shankar Vedantam
summary: Why do people like to play matchmaker? New research finds that matchmaking produces happiness and, the more unlikely the match, the greater the happiness for the matchmaker.
